Accessibility

Continuous Lines

Thin white line draws on a dark grey background as the user clicks and drags their mouse

Click and drag the mouse to draw a line.

function setup() {
  createCanvas(710, 400);
  background(102);
}

function draw() {
  stroke(255);
  if (mouseIsPressed === true) {
    line(mouseX, mouseY, pmouseX, pmouseY);
  }
}
